thread.title: Hamas’ Hamdan: We Are Not Fighting Alone, Victory is Closer than Ever
thread.title_full: Hamas’ Hamdan: We Are Not Fighting Alone, Victory is Closer than Ever

title: Hamas’ Hamdan: We Are Not Fighting Alone, Victory is Closer than Ever
text:
Top Hamas representative in Lebanon Osama Hamdan told Al-Manar on Thursday that the Palestinian resistance is not fighting alone and that the Axis of Resistance is offering all forms of support.
In an interview with Al-Manar’s Panorama Today, Hamdan stressed that the “victory is closer than ever.”
“What we are receiving from the battlefield is reassuring regarding the resistance and the people’s capabilities of steadfastness,” the top Hamas official stated.
He lauded the rising acts of resistance in the West Bank, affirming that the “developments in the region is heading towards victory.”
“The resistance is still active on the ground; the Palestinian people is resolute and the Axis of Resistance stands by Gaza.”
Hamdan, meanwhile, pointed to the coordination between the leaderships of Hamas and Hezbollah in all stages of the battle.
“We hold joint assessments and there is brotherly partnership with Hezbollah,” the Hamas official said.
Video showing Hezbollah strike on Al-Wazzani border area on March 5, 2024.
“Hezbollah took the initiative and got into the battle since the first days of the war out of its commitment to the Palestinian cause and resistance path.”
He also saluted the
resistance in Yemen over its role in supporting Gaza, noting that it has imposed a siege on the Zionist entity.
Source: Al-Manar English Website
